remarks: The inverse of the identity is the identity.  (Contributed by AV, 8-Apr-2017.)
statement:
invid.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
invid.i $e |- I = ( Id ` C ) $.
invid.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
invid.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
invid $p |- ( ph -> ( I ` X ) ( X ( Inv ` C ) X ) ( I ` X ) ) $.
